page.title: 11The Village Hall
page.content: West Hill's new village hall is at the moment being built.The old village hall was far too small and didn't have a car park.The new one was funded by the county council the Town Council and private donations.The hope is that the village hall will be the hall for the new primary school if and when it is built. The old hall was used for playgroup meetings, school plays, WI and many other things.The new hall will take the place of the old one and will provide for these oganisations much more adequately.The new hall is sited beyond Potters Country Market in the same field as the schools sport area (sqare 11).It will have a large main area,large enough a badminton court and two smaller rooms.
